name: TextDrawShowForAll
description: Shows a textdraw for all players.

params_body.name: text
params_body.description: The ID of the textdraw to show. Returned by TextDrawCreate.

return_values:
1: The function executed successfully. 

 0: The function failed to execute. This means the textdraw specified does not exist.
related_fn:
TextDrawShowForPlayer: Show a textdraw for a certain player.
 TextDrawHideForPlayer: Hide a textdraw for a certain player.
 TextDrawHideForAll: Hide a textdraw for all players.
